title: KATRINA’S WORK
content: Katrina’s mother is very kind to her. She gave her some knitting needles one day. She gave her a big ball of red yarn. She showed Katrina how to knit. Katrina learned very fast. Soon she could knit as well as her mother. Her mother showed her how to knit stockings, mittens, lace, and even a hood. Katrina is very proud of her knitting work.
